original_text: But the hand of Ahikam the son of Shaphan was with Jeremiah so that he was not given over to the people to be put to death.
korean_text: 사반의 아들 아히감의 손이 예레미야를 도와 주어 그를 백성의 손에 내어 주지 아니하여 죽이지 못하게 하니라

sentences.original_text: But the hand of Ahikam the son of Shaphan was with Jeremiah
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 사반의 아들 아히감의 손이 예레미야와 함께 있었다

sentences.original_text: so that he was not given over to the people
